Extract the last test done by a patient in days and how long ago

This determines the last test done by that patient and the time between now and that last test in days

SurveilLastToNow(dataframe, HospNum_Id, Endo_ResultPerformed)

Arguments

dataframe

dataframe
HospNum_Id

Patient ID
Endo_ResultPerformed

Date of the Endoscopy

Examples

SurveilLastToNow(Myendo,'HospitalNumber',
'Dateofprocedure')
#> # A tibble: 2,000 x 14
#> # Groups:   HospitalNumber [100]
